summary: An army major, himself guilty of cowardice, is asked to recommend soldiers for the Congressional Medal of Honor during the Mexican Border Incursion of 1916.
cast: Gary Cooper|Rita Hayworth|Van Heflin|Tab Hunter|Richard Conte|Michael Callan|Dick York|Robert Keith|Carlos Romero|Jim Bannon|Edward Platt|Maurice Jara|Sam Buffington|Arthur Hanson|Clem Fuller|Wendell Hoyt|Maggie
title: Llegaron a Cordura
